description:
As advocates for victims of personal injury, our team at The Law Offices of Samuel Fishman wins. We have a history of success in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, when pursuing compensation on behalf of people who have suffered catastrophic injuries. From car accidents to dog bites to slip and falls, our team has the experience and knowledge to secure awards for our clients.

Some of our law offices' most notable cases include the following:

• A $3.5 million settlement following a tractor trailer incident
• A $1.5 million settlement on behalf of a victim of a motorcycle accident
• A $400,000 settlement for a client who suffered a slip and fall

Among us, we have decades of experience in recreating accident scenes and working with medical professionals to create compelling cases for our clients. We are comfortable taking cases to litigation when necessary, though we often seek to settle matters quickly in order to help our clients get back on their feet as soon as possible.

Since opening our doors, we have helped more than 20,000 people through the justice system. We have appeared on their behalf in both state and federal courts. The Law Offices of Samuel Fishman offers free initial consultations. We do not charge our clients a fee unless we win their case.
